avalancheActivity.comment: As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of wet avalanches being released will increase gradually in all regions. In all aspects small and medium-sized avalanches are possible. Gliding avalanches are possible. Avalanches can as before be released, in particular by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights:
Wet and gliding avalanches are the main danger.
Backcountry tours should be concluded early.

snowpackStructure.comment: The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to moistening of the snowpack.

tendency.comment: Over a wide area warming. The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to increasing moistening of the snowpack in all aspects.

avalancheActivity.comment:
As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of wet avalanches being released will increase gradually in all regions. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular on steep sunny slopes. In all aspects medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large avalanches are possible. Gliding avalanches can also occur.
Avalanches can as before be released, in particular by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights:
Wet and gliding avalanches are the main danger.
Backcountry tours should be concluded early.

snowpackStructure.comment: The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to moistening of the snowpack. This applies in particular on sunny slopes. Weak layers exist in the snowpack.

tendency.comment: Over a wide area warming. The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to increasing moistening of the snowpack in all aspects.
